Actors: Will Smith, Alec Baldwin, Albert Brooks, Gugu Mbatha-Raw
Writer: Peter Landesman, Jeanne Marie Laskas (based on the GQ article "Game Brain" by)
Title: Concussion
Awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 4 wins & 15 nominations.
Plot: In Pittsburgh, accomplished pathologist Dr. Bennet Omalu uncovers the truth about brain damage in football players who suffer repeated concussions in the course of normal play.
